seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years of experience required and no senior title indicated; aligns with typical mid‑level data engineer expectations.

job_family.evidence: Job title is "Data Engineer-Business Intelligence" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, reporting and ETL.

sub_specialty.evidence: Role emphasizes BI/DW projects, reporting with Cognos, and ETL tools, which are core to data‑warehouse work.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management, team lead, or direct reports; responsibilities are individual contributor focused.

primary_cloud.evidence: Must‑have hard skills list includes AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure, indicating experience across multiple cloud platforms.

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three cloud providers appear in the required skill set.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL/Data Integration tools (DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica) and BI reporting, typical of batch processing pipelines.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tool (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) is referenced in the posting.

storage_layer.evidence: Role centers on BI/DW reporting and Cognos, which commonly consume data from data warehouses.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is explicitly stated as Pune, Maharashtra, India with no remote work language.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is tied to an Indian office; therefore the primary timezone is India Standard Time.

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation requirement or package is mentioned; candidates are expected to be based in Pune.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned; posting is for an Indian location, implying no H‑1B sponsorship.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility; role is based in India, making student‑visa support unlikely.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions are stated.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is not specified; typical IBM roles are full‑time employee but not explicitly stated.

benefits_level.evidence: The benefits array is empty and no perks are described in the posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career progression, ladders, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs or senior‑to‑junior learning references are included.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions, ladders, or advancement is present.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The job description does not reference internal transfers or mobility.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are mentioned.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must‑have hard and soft skills plus a minimum of 3 years; only one nice‑to‑have skill (UNIX) listed.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused specifically on BI data engineering tasks without mixing other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set (Cognos, multiple cloud platforms, ETL tools) aligns reasonably with a 3‑year experienced mid‑level data engineer.
